General.Name: Victorian Plumbing Group PLC
General.Description: Victorian Plumbing Group plc operates as an online retailer of bathroom products and accessories in the United Kingdom. The company offers a range of products to B2C and trade customers with approximately 130 brands, as well as designs and develops in-house products. Its bathroom product lines include tiles, flooring, and lighting. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is headquartered in Skelmersdale, United Kingdom.
General.Address: 22 Grimrod Place, Skelmersdale, United Kingdom, WN8 9UU
